figure_1: Trial schematic for the language and color shape switching tasks.
figure_2:
Distribution of error rates on switch trials and disfluencies in the nondominant language for decliners and controls
The bolded center line shows the median of all error rates per group. The outer lines of the square show the first quartile (bottom) and third quartile (top). The extended lines show the minimum and maximum values without outlier.
figure_3: Receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curves classifying participants as decliners versus controls.
